Bangladesh: Chandra Gupta II (Chandragupta Vikramaditya), son of Samudra Gupta, the Gupta Empire achieved its zenith under his reign, the Chinese pilgrim Fa-Hsien describes Indian culture during his reign (to 415)
Italy: Valentinian the Great died of a stroke. His son Gratian, then junior augustus in the west, succeeded him as senior augustus. The army acclaimed Valentinian the Great's young son Valentinian II augustus of the west.
